## encodeGray32 variable

Converts 32bit unsigned int to Gray code (reflected binary). Gray codes of successive values always have a Hamming distance of 1 (i.e. only 1 bit changes at a time).

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gray\_code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gray_code)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
encodeGray32: (x: number) => number
```
